overview:
Ozgur Alaz, the co-founder of the digital marketing agency Promoqube and interactive appointment services company OpenAgenda, is a trend specialist and entrepreneur who has graduated from ITU Management Engineering in 2005. He leads projects related to digital strategy and marketing technology development. Besides having experience in finance, telecom and digital business models, Alaz is an expert in social media, digital strategy, business model innovation, trend analysis, lean startups and personal productivity among others.

He has been sharing his ideas in marketallica.com since 5 years to inspire those in marketing about innovations. He is listed as one of the world’s most successful members of springspotters.com - the largest trend network of the world. His articles have been credited many times by leader websites such as psfk.com, trendwatching.com, tompeters.com and springwise.com. He is one of the co-writers of the book Age of Conversation and the organizer of Likemind Istanbul - an organization which brings together like minded people. He has attended many marketing events such as Marketing Summit, Webrazzi Summit and Social Media Summit as a lecturer on trends and digital strategy.
